Reviews.Title: “No Frills but nice hotel”

Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel son clean beds day towels soap changed daily elevator breakfast exactly cup coffee pastry hotel location close circle underground train barcelona near internet cafe shops bottled water else hilton 80 night 2 cant beat check web site plan ahead discount

Reviews.Title: “awful”
Reviews.Author: davecave
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 night weekend break daughter twin arrived hotel woman reception phone 10 minutes laughing joking acknowledge finally checking gentleman speak english floor 103 key lock spending 5 minutes trying obviously broken doorlock managed gain entry tried key door suggested master key insisted reception explained woman reception happened tutted key 203 unhelpful staff speak english breakfast joke cup coffee croissant thats grey tiled cracks cold bathroom tv 6 spanish channels ceiling dirty little wardrobe spare pillow pen marks location getting centre city thats definitely recommend hotel unless barcelona alot european countries barcelona 4 times worst hotel
